sourcesContent:
<template>
  <cus-wraper>
    <cus-page-title-back :isDialog="true"
                         :label="pdUwSiTypeDtOptions?$t('premFormulaSelect.pdExtPremFormulaSelect'):$t('premFormulaSelect.pdPremFormulaSelect')"
                         @backTo="back"/>
    <el-form ref="productBnftForm" :model="productBnftForm" label-width="auto">
      <el-row :gutter="10">
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('rule.productDetailType')">
            <cus-select v-model="productBnftForm.productType" :codetype="'ProductCategory'"
                        @change="productDetailTypeChanged"></cus-select>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('rule.appointedProduct')">
            <el-select v-model="productBnftForm.appointProduct" :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdBnft.pleaseChoose')" clearable
                       filterable @change="appointFindPremById">
              <el-option v-for="item in productOptionList" :key="item.value" :label="item.label" :value="item.value">
              </el-option>
            </el-select>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('premFormulaSelect.appointedPrem')">
            <el-select v-model="productBnftForm.appointPrem" :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdBnft.pleaseChoose')"
                       clearable filterable @change="appointFindAExtPremById">
              <el-option v-for="item in premOptions" :key="item.value" :label="item.label" :value="item.value">
              </el-option>
            </el-select>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
      </el-row>
      <el-row :gutter="10">
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('premFormulaSelect.appointedExtPrem')">
            <el-select v-model="productBnftForm.appointExtPrem" :disabled="!pdUwSiTypeDtOptions && calRuleIfShow"
                       :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdBnft.pleaseChoose')" clearable filterable>
              <el-option v-for="item in extPremOptions" :key="item.value" :label="item.label" :value="item.value">
              </el-option>
            </el-select>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('rule.pdCalcCode')">
            <el-input v-model="productBnftForm.pdBussCode" clearable></el-input>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('rule.pdBussDetailType')">
            <cus-select v-model="calculationFormulaType" codetype="ruleBusinessDetailClass" disabled></cus-select>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
      </el-row>
      <el-row :gutter="10" type="flex">
        <el-col :span="8"></el-col>
        <el-col :span="8"></el-col>
        <el-col :span="8" style="text-align: right">
          <el-button icon="el-icon-search" size="small" type="primary" @click="handleSearch">
            {{ $t('table.search') }}
          </el-button>
        </el-col>
      </el-row>
    </el-form>

    <cus-table-title
      :label="calculationFormulaType === '17' ? $t('premFormulaSelect.premFormula') : $t('premFormulaSelect.extPremFormula')"/>
    <el-table ref="ruleTable" :data="ruleTable" border element-loading-text="Loading" fit highlight-current-row
              max-height="300" size="mini" @row-click="rowClick">
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.id')" align="center" width="50">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ initTableIndex('page', scope.$index) }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.detail')" align="center" width="100">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          <el-button size="small" type="text" @click="showFormula(scope.row)">>></el-button>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('rule.product')" align="center" min-width="200">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          {{ scope.row.pdCode ? scope.row.pdCode + ':' + scope.row.pdName : '' }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column v-if="calculationFormulaType === '17'" :label="$t('premFormulaSelect.premItem')" align="center"
                       min-width="200">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          {{ scope.row.premiumCode ? scope.row.premiumCode + ':' + scope.row.premiumName : '' }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column v-if="calculationFormulaType === '19'" :label="$t('premFormulaSelect.extPremItem')"
                       align="center" min-width="200">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          {{ scope.row.extPremiumCode ? scope.row.extPremiumCode + ':' + scope.row.extPremiumName : '' }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('rule.pdBussDetailType')" align="center" min-width="200" prop="pdBussDetailType">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ scope.row.pdBussDetailType | filter_pdBussDetailType }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('rule.pdCalcCode')" align="center" min-width="200"
                       prop="pdCalcCode"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('rule.pdCalcDesc')" align="center" min-width="200"
                       prop="pdCalcDesc"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('rule.ruleAttr')" align="center" min-width="200">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{
            scope.row.ruleAttr === '1' ? $t('rule.general') : (scope.row.ruleAttr === '2' ? $t('rule.individual') : '')
          }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.actions')" align="center" fixed="right" width="120">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          <el-button v-auth="'PremAmountFormul:associate'" icon="el-icon-connection"
                     size="mini" type="primary" @click="handleSelectFormula(scope.row)">
            {{ $t('form.select') }}
          </el-button>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
    </el-table>
    <cus-pagination ref="page" v-model="ruleTable" :autoBuild="false" :pageSize="5" :params="params"
                    url="/PremAmountFormul/list/findAllAmountFormula"/>

    <!-- 公式查看弹窗 -->
    <cus-rule-modify :flag="formulaView.flag" :performType="formulaView.performType" :ruleCode="formulaView.ruleCode"
                     :ruleModifyClosed="ruleMakeClosed" :ruleType="'2'"
                     :visible="formulaView.visible"></cus-rule-modify>

  </cus-wraper>
</template>

<script>

import {
  appointFindPremById,
  associate,
  findAllProduct,
  findAllProductByDetailType,
  findExtPremById
} from "@/api/basicinfo/premAmountFormula"

let _this

export default {
  name: 'premFormulaSelect',
  filters: {
    filter_pdBussType(code) {
      return _this.getCodeName('pdCalcBussType', code)
    },
    filter_pdBussDetailType(code) {
      return _this.getCodeName('ruleBusinessDetailClass', code)
    }
  },
  props: {
    guaranteeDetails: {
      type: String,
      required: true
    },
    calculationFormulaType: {
      type: String,
      required: true
    },
    pdUwSiTypeOptions: {
      type: String,
      required: false,
      default: ''
    },
    pdUwSiTypeDtOptions: {
      type: String,
      required: false,
      default: ''
    }
  },
  data() {
    _this = this
    return {
      calRuleIfShow: true,
      formulaView: {
        flag: '',
        ruleCode: '',
        performType: '',
        visible: false
      },
      product: {
        id: undefined,
        bType: '',
        cType: '',
        pdCode: '',
        pdEdition: '',
        pdVerId: undefined,
        pdSalechnl: '',
        pdName: '',
        pdShortname: '',
        pdEnName: '',
        pdShortEnName: '',
        operator: '',
        pdApplDate: undefined,
        pdProcessId: undefined,
        createTime: undefined,
        updateTime: undefined
      },
      form_rule: {
        ruleBussModuDeta: '',
        description: ''
      },
      params: {
        product: undefined,
        current_pdBussId: undefined,
        current_pdBussDetailType: '',
        eq_productDetailType: '',
        eq_pdInfoId: undefined,
        eq_pdBussId: '',
        like_pdCalcCode: ''
      },
      pdUwSiType: '',
      tableData_formula: [],
      productOptionList: [],//产品数组
      premOptions: [],//指定缴费数组
      extPremOptions: [],//指定加费数组
      ruleTable: [],
      productBnftForm: {
        product: '',
        appointProduct: '',
        appointPrem: '',
        appointExtPrem: '',
        pdBussCode: '',
        productType: '',
        productBigType: ''
      }
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    this.initProductOptions()
    this.productBnftForm.product = this.product.pdCode + ":" + this.product.id
  },
  created() {
    this.initProductInfo()
  },
  methods: {
    productDetailTypeChanged(val) {
      findAllProductByDetailType(this.buildRequestData({productDetailType: val})).then(response => {
        this.productOptionList = []
        response.data.forEach(val => {
          this.productOptionList.push({
            key: val.id,
            value: val.pdCode + ":" + val.id,
            label: val.pdCode + ":" + val.pdName
          })
        })
      })
    },
    ruleMakeClosed() {
      this.formulaView.visible = false
    },
    //显示指定缴费项数组
    appointFindPremById(val) {
      this.$nextTick(() => {
        this.premOptions = []
        this.extPremOptions = []
        this.productBnftForm.appointPrem = ''
        this.productBnftForm.appointExtPrem = ''
        if (!val) {
          return
        }
        let id = this.getCaption(val, 1)
        let params2 = {
          pdId: id
        }
        appointFindPremById(params2).then(res => {
          let data = res.data
          if (data.length) {
            data.forEach(val => {
              this.premOptions.push({
                key: val.id,
                value: val.id + ":" + val.pdPremCode,
                label: val.pdPremCode + ":" + val.pdPayName
              })
            })
          }
        })
      })
    },
    //显示指定加费项数组
    appointFindAExtPremById(val) {
      this.productBnftForm.appointExtPrem = ''
      this.extPremOptions = []
      if (!val) {
        return
      }
      let code = this.getCaption(val, 1)
      findExtPremById(code).then(res => {
        let data = res.data
        if (data.length) {
          data.forEach(val => {
            this.extPremOptions.push({
              key: val.id,
              value: val.id + ":" + val.pdExtPremCode,
              label: val.pdExtPremCode + ":" + val.pdExtPremName
            })
          })
        }
      })
    },
    getCaption(obj, state) {
      const index = obj.lastIndexOf(":")
      if (state === 0) {
        return obj.substring(0, index)
      } else {
        return obj.substring(index + 1, obj.length)
      }
    },
    initProductInfo() {
      let pdtempPdInfo = this.getPdData()
      if (Object.keys(pdtempPdInfo).length > 0) {
        Object.assign(this.product, pdtempPdInfo)
        this.productBnftForm.productBigType = this.product.bType
        //this.productBnftForm.productType = this.product.cType
      } else {
        this.notifyError(this.$t('message.invalidProductInfo'))
      }
    },
    initProductOptions() {
      findAllProduct(this.product.id).then(response => {
        if (response.data.length) {
          response.data.forEach(val => {
            this.productOptionList.push({
              key: val.id,
              value: val.pdCode + ":" + val.id,
              label: val.pdCode + ":" + val.pdName
            })
          })
        }
      })
    },
    showFormula(row) {
      this.formulaView.flag = '1'
      this.formulaView.ruleCode = row.pdCalcCode
      this.formulaView.performType = row.performType
      this.formulaView.visible = true
    },
    back() {
      this.$emit('changeDialogVisible_formulaSelect', false)
    },
    async handleSearch() {
      return new Promise(resolve => {
        this.params.product = this.product
        this.params.current_pdBussId = this.pdUwSiTypeDtOptions ? this.getCaption(this.pdUwSiTypeDtOptions, 0) : this.getCaption(this.pdUwSiTypeOptions, 0)
        this.params.current_pdBussDetailType = this.calculationFormulaType
        this.params.eq_productDetailType = this.productBnftForm.productType
        this.params.eq_pdInfoId = this.getCaption(this.productBnftForm.appointProduct, 1)
        this.params.eq_pdBussId = this.calculationFormulaType === '17' ? this.getCaption(this.productBnftForm.appointPrem, 0) : this.getCaption(this.productBnftForm.appointExtPrem, 0)
        this.params.like_pdCalcCode = this.productBnftForm.pdBussCode
        this.$refs.page.reload().then(() => {
          resolve()
        })
      })
    },
    rowClick(row, column, event) {
      if (event.target.nodeName === "INPUT") {
        if (row.pdCalcCode === this.productBnftForm.pdCalcCode) {
          this.productBnftForm.pdCalcCode = ''
        } else {
          this.productBnftForm.pdCalcCode = row.pdCalcCode
        }
      }
    },
    handleSelectFormula(row) {
      let PdtempPdCalc = {
        pdInfoId: this.getCaption(this.productBnftForm.product, 1),
        pdVerId: this.product.pdVerId,
        pdType: '',
        pdCode: this.getCaption(this.productBnftForm.product, 0),
        pdBussType: this.guaranteeDetails,
        pdBussDetailType: this.calculationFormulaType,
        pdBussId: '',
        pdBussCode: '',
        pdStructureType: '',
        pdCalcCode: row.pdCalcCode,
        pdCalcDesc: row.pdCalcDesc
      }
      if (this.pdUwSiTypeDtOptions) {
        PdtempPdCalc.pdStructureType = '06'
        PdtempPdCalc.pdBussId = this.getCaption(this.pdUwSiTypeDtOptions, 0)
        PdtempPdCalc.pdBussCode = this.getCaption(this.pdUwSiTypeDtOptions, 1)
      } else {
        PdtempPdCalc.pdStructureType = '05'
        PdtempPdCalc.pdBussId = this.getCaption(this.pdUwSiTypeOptions, 0)
        PdtempPdCalc.pdBussCode = this.getCaption(this.pdUwSiTypeOptions, 1)
      }
      const param = {
        selectedFormula: row,
        pdtempPdCalc: PdtempPdCalc,
        product: this.product,
        pdBussType: this.guaranteeDetails,
        pdBussDetailType: this.calculationFormulaType,
        needChecking: true
      }
      associate(this.buildRequestData(param)).then(response => {
        let successFlag = response.data.flag
        let pdtempPdCalc = response.data.pdtempPdCalc
        if (successFlag === true) {
          this.handleSearch().then(() => {
            this.notifySuccess(this.$t('rule.associationSuccess'))
          })
          this.$emit('bringInCalcCode', pdtempPdCalc.pdBussDetailType, pdtempPdCalc.pdBussId, pdtempPdCalc.pdCalcCode)
        } else {
          this.$confirm(String(this.$t('underwritingAmountFormulaSelect.confirm_overwrite_formula')), String(this.$t('confirmMessage.tip')), {
            confirmButtonText: String(this.$t('confirmMessage.confirm')),
            cancelButtonText: String(this.$t('confirmMessage.cancel')),
            type: 'warning'
          }).then(() => {
            param.needChecking = false
            associate(this.buildRequestData(param)).then(response => {
              let pdtempPdCalc = response.data.pdtempPdCalc
              this.handleSearch().then(() => {
                this.notifySuccess(this.$t('rule.associationSuccess'))
              })
              this.$emit('bringInCalcCode', pdtempPdCalc.pdBussDetailType, pdtempPdCalc.pdBussId, pdtempPdCalc.pdCalcCode)
            })
          }).catch(() => {
            this.messageInfo(this.$t('underwritingAmountFormulaSelect.canceled'))
          })
        }
      })
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>

</style>
